abilities.name: Amphibious.
abilities.description: Gar can breathe air and water.

abilities.name: Legendary Resistance
abilities.description: If Gar fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

abilities.name: Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
Gar is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following druid spells prepared:
* Cantrips (at will): mending, resistance, shape water
* 1st level (4 slots): create or destroy water, cure wounds, fog cloud, thunderwave
* 2nd level (3 slots): darkvision, hold person, protection from poison
* 3rd level (3 slots): call lightning, sleet storm, tidal wave
* 4th level (3 slots): control water, ice storm
* 5th level (1 slot): scrying

abilities.name: Water Walk.
abilities.description: Gar can stand and move on liquid surfaces as if they were solid ground.

abilities.name: Watery Fall.
abilities.description: When Gar drops to 0 hit points, his body collapses into a pool of inky water that rapidly disperses. Anything he was wearing or carrying is left behind.
